doc.title: Se habla rock
doc.plot: For the rebellious Rockero whose library includes everything from Caf√© Tacvba to System of a Down, Mun2 highly recommends a weekly dose of Se Habla Rock hosted by "Renato." An alternative to the overrated trend; On Se Habla Rock you get the best of English/Spanish alternative, punk-rock, and eclectic music video play. Se Habla Rock reaches all rockeros from hard-core rockers to emo/teenyboppers every Sunday at 11pm ET, only on Mun2.
